name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Alexa rank in Google Search, Bing and Yahoo

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show Alexa rank for Google Search results (plus Bing and Yahoo)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to view Alexa ranking for each site listed within Google, Bing and Yahoo search results.

Includes 90 day trend and ranks in top countries, along with shortcut links to view more details on Alexa.com.

NEW in 0.2.0:
- Works with new Google Search Results layout
